message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I'm interested in the product, but $95 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $85.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $90 is my final offer, I'm sure you'll find that it's a competitive price.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $90 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm thinking more along the lines of $82.50.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here. $87.50 is the lowest I can go.  Take it or leave it.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $87.50 is still a bit too high for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $82. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet in the middle.
